Join us next Thursday to discuss the role of the Govt's proposed National Infrastructure Bank in getting us to #zerocarbon and financing London's green, fair recovery - with @NVJRobins1 @EnvAgency @Jamesogradycam @nickygavron @RhianMariThomas @GFI_green

Our NatureBid auction is now open and closes on Sun 28th!

tweets.text:
üì¢ The new Upper Kent page is now live on our website! üëâ https://t.co/1OgeSI1PbI

This page holds lots of information from @EnvAgencyNW about phases 2 and 3 of the #Kendal flood scheme which covers Burneside, Staveley and Ings & Upstream Measures.

#floodaware #Cumbria #flooding https://t.co/oiAAGooZz1
Talking natural flood management again for Local TV @EnvAgencyNW @WoodlandTrust @merseyforest https://t.co/sjzao2WRpW
Users update - #Culham lock is closed due to hydraulic hose burst under the River bed - we will keep users updated . @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @Jennifer_Hil1 @TW11Harbour

EA‚Äôs Dave Brown will be on @LpoolLocalTV this evening at 6pm to talk about natural flood management and working in partnership with @merseyforest and @sthelenscouncil #slowtheflow https://t.co/sXgkQmppCP

Phase1 @WildTroutTrust & Kilnsey AC. White Beck #Wharfe protected from livestock so riparian flora can develop + tree planting (thanks @kilnseypark @TCVtweets #IDigTrees).
Phase2 in-channel spawning & fry habitat funded by @EnvAgencyYNE #FIP & WTT's @YorkshireWater TROUT project https://t.co/uwDSw57FWH
Local Authority Treescapes Fund now launched and very importantly includes natural regeneration. Thankyou for listening @DefraGovUK  https://t.co/ecUKC2n218

@anniekb @ChilternSociety @ChilternsAONB @EnvAgency @Feargal_Sharkey @thameswater @thameswater are pumping sewage from their balancing tanks upstream, into the Misbourne, to prevent surcharging into properties in Chalfont St. Peter.

Oh dear.

QC has a view that the @EnvAgency must proactively safeguard SSSIs, SACs from harm, like abstraction.

CEO of EA says no we don't.

Just days later @Defra issue guidance to the EA "You MUST NOT WAIT until a site is harmed to put conservation measures in place." Oops. https://t.co/elg6fIrmQs

Nasty smell of #plastic in the air tonight @CityofYork @EnvAgencyYNE
Wind blowing #AllertonParkIncinerator fumes over #York ?
@plumeplotter 
#PoorAirQuality

The coarse fish #CloseSeason starts today, meaning it‚Äôs illegal to fish for coarse fish in rivers until 15 June inclusive.  

We spoke to Fisheries Officer Matt Buck to find out why the close season is so important üëá

More info: https://t.co/u6IhTpkgUB #Angling https://t.co/wVVj0shIow

urls.title: Start of the close season: How do we protect our breeding fish at this time of year?
urls.description: Matt Buck, Fisheries Technical Specialist for the Midlands, explains how close season helps protect our breeding fish. Well the evenings are getting lighter, and across the country fish are starting to move out of their winter haunts - a sure ‚Ä¶

tweets.text: @henryadamsUK Seems very odd. Such salami slicing goes against good practice environmental impact assessment principles, and is clearly not applying the ALARP principle. @EnvAgency shouldn't tolerate this right on their doorstep. They certainly wouldn't tolerate it in other industries
https://t.co/8WFkjNlqbu

We‚Äôre identifying a lot of opportunities in the Churnet Valley through our #WEG project @EnvAgencyMids @NE_WestMids @CatchmentDove. We‚Äôre offering bespoke advice to > 20 farms on all things water related from soil health to slowing the flow. All to create cleaner rivers. https://t.co/8IhsxHVBoC

https://t.co/vESFSYlp33 @pinkcastleprincess thanks for this.  A damning report on the @EnvAgency  @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA

We suspect this is because 45MW exceeds a threshold between 2 categories, relating to either or both of planning or the auction for balancing services to the grid.
The division seems dodgy.
Cld this division dodge a need for an environmental statement?
We need to know, urgently..

tweets.text: @ProfJGrey @WildTroutTrust @kilnseypark @EnvAgencyYNE @YorkshireWater @YorkDalesRT @Jack_Hirst3 @SandTCUKYorks @PeteTurnerEA @wildlifetoursuk This looks super interesting! Thanks so much for sharing. Would love to know more about riparian woodland and the benefits to rivers and landscape @ProfJGrey. Could you follow us so I can DM you?

During a sonar survey we discovered three fyke nets which are used for eel fishing.

The eel closed season is Dec 1 to March 31st which means these nets should not be being used. 

These were lost tackle so no one was actively using them but we will be taking enforcement action. https://t.co/pYnXCdltFk
